ai.grakn.engine.tasks.manager.singlequeue

Class SingleQueueTaskRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.engine.tasks.manager.singlequeue.SingleQueueTaskRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Runnable

    public class SingleQueueTaskRunner
extends Object
implements Runnable, AutoCloseable
    The SingleQueueTaskRunner is used by the SingleQueueTaskManager to execute tasks from a Kafka queue.
    Author:
    aelred, alexandrorth

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SingleQueueTaskRunner(SingleQueueTaskManager manager, EngineID engineID, ExternalOffsetStorage offsetStorage, int timeUntilBackoff)
      Create a SingleQueueTaskRunner which retrieves tasks from the given and uses the given to store and retrieve information about tasks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close connection to Kafka and thread pool.
      void run()
      Poll Kafka for any new tasks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleQueueTaskRunner

        public SingleQueueTaskRunner(SingleQueueTaskManager manager,
                             EngineID engineID,
                             ExternalOffsetStorage offsetStorage,
                             int timeUntilBackoff)
        Create a SingleQueueTaskRunner which retrieves tasks from the given and uses the given to store and retrieve information about tasks.
        Parameters:
        engineID - identifier of the engine this task runner is on
        manager - a place to control the lifecycle of tasks
        offsetStorage - a place to externally store kafka offsets

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Poll Kafka for any new tasks. Will not return until close() is called. After receiving tasks, accept as many as possible, up to the maximum allowed number of tasks. For each task, follow the workflow based on its type: - If not created or not in storage: - Record that this engine is running this task Record that this task is running - Send to thread pool for execution: - Use reflection to retrieve task - Start from checkpoint if necessary, or from beginning (TODO) - Record that this engine is no longer running this task Mark as completed or failed - Acknowledge message in queue
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • close

        public void close()
           throws Exception
        Close connection to Kafka and thread pool. Inform run() method to stop and block until it returns.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        Exception

      • stopTask

        public boolean stopTask(TaskId taskId)
        Stop the task if it is executing on this machine
        Parameters:
        taskId - Identifier of the task to stop
        Returns:
        True if the task is stopped
